item.description:
Hey Everyone,

For the November meet-up we are going to see a hockey game at the TD Bank North Garden. The Montreal Canadien's are playing the Boston Bruins. The game time is at 7 PM on Thursday November 8. Tickets will be 35 dollars. There is a chance that we may get a deal on tickets but it depends on how many people are going to the game. I am asking for payment in full or atleast a deposit of 20 dollars. You can send me the money through paypal. You can send the money to ascholte@gmail.com If you have any questions please let me know!

Thanks,

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian November Meetup - Canadiens vs Bruins
